URL Encode/Decode

Encode and decode URL strings locally in your browser.

FAQ

What is URL encoding?

URL encoding converts special characters in a URL to a format that can be safely transmitted over the internet. For example, spaces become %20.

Is my data sent to a server?

No. All processing happens locally in your browser.
